name: Hard Mixed Bag 7 Quiz / Test | Mixed 10 Q. Difficult [C] | 10 Questions

questions.text: In land surveying how long, in feet, is a chain?
questions.explanation:
66.

	A chain is one tenth of a furlong, one chain equals 100 links and there are 80 chains to a mile.

questions.text: In what state did 'Lilies Of The Field' grow - perhaps Sidney Poitier knows?
questions.explanation:
Arizona.

	It's a story about a man who helps nuns build a church and do God's work.

questions.text: Who was Sandra Dee's boyfriend in 'A Summer Place'?
questions.explanation:
Troy Donahue.

	The action happens in a Maine resort.

questions.text: In what city is the Babe Ruth Baseball Museum located?
questions.explanation:
Baltimore.

	It opened to the public in 1974 as the Babe Ruth Birthplace Shrine.

questions.text: The FBI began under whose administration?
questions.explanation:
Teddy Roosevelt.

	It was organized in 1908 and acquired its present name in 1935.

questions.text: Which of the following deserts listed is the largest?
In 'Jack and the Beanstalk' which of the following was not one of the things that Jack stole from the giant?
Which is not a type of pencil?
A whistle is a type of woodwind instrument.
Which of the following was the goddess of marriage?
